Digits 4 and 7 are lucky, while all others are unlucky. An integer is lucky if it contains only lucky digitsin decimal notation. We would like to know the K-th lucky positive integer.

Input
The first and only line of input contains a positive integer K (1 ≤ K ≤ 10^9).

Output
The first and only line of output must contain the K-th lucky positive integer.

Example
Input:1Output:4Input:3Output:44
